About Amber Heard's separation, Amber Heard and Johnny Depp's case has been all the rage for a long time now. The couple is taking on a legitimate conflict to separate and has asserted actual maltreatment charges against each other. Following the actual maltreatment case, Johnny Depp has been eliminated from his part as Grindelwald in the impending Fantastic Beasts 3 film. Fanatics of Johnny Depp have made a few petitions online for the expulsion of Amber Heard from the Aquaman establishment. Twitter is loaded up with fans who are against Amber Heard proceeding as Mera. 
 
The DC Extended Universe is an always developing spot, which is known for keeping the moviegoing crowd on their aggregate toes. Discussions encompassing Zack Snyder's Justice League aren't easing back down at any point in the near future, yet there are various profoundly expected activities descending the line. This incorporates James Wan's Aquaman 2, and entertainer Amber Heard has been prodding her return as Mera.
 
Aquaman 2 is right now expected to hit theaters in 2022, so creation might be beginning soon. There has been a great deal of hypothesis about Amber Heard's part in Aquaman 2 as of late. Unverified reports continue to seem on the web and across online media demanding the entertainer isn't probably going to return as the champion Mera in Warner Bros.' spin-off of James Wan's 2018 superhuman hit, and some have recommended that she had been supplanted. 
 
"I'm really amped up for the measure of fan love and the measure of fan appreciation that Aquaman has obtained and that it has earned such a lot of energy for Aquaman and Mera that it implies we'll be returning," Heard tells EW. "I'm so eager to film that." Heard added that the creation desires to get in progress at some point in 2021.
 
In January, a sound chronicle was presented at the path where Heard conceded "hitting" Depp. In any case, recently, an appointed authority excused Depp's case, deciding that the paper's charge against Depp was "significantly obvious." Depp has kept up his blamelessness and said he intends to bid the choice. "Paid reports and paid missions via online media don't direct [casting decisions] in light of the fact that they have no premise in actuality," Heard added. "Just the fans really got Aquaman and Aquaman 2 going. I'm eager to begin one year from now." Heard recently stated that she has lost work because of standing up against sexual savagery. "Friends and counselors disclosed to me I could never again fill in as an entertainer — that I would be boycotted," Heard wrote in a 2018 0p-ed for the Washington Post. "A film I joined to reevaluate my job. I had recently shot a two-year crusade as the essence of a worldwide design brand, and the organization dropped me." In the wake of The Sun decision a week ago, Warner Bros. requested that Depp venture down from the Fantastic Beasts establishment. Hannibal entertainer Mads Mikkelsen is presently in talks to assume control over the part of dull wizard Gellert Grindelwald.
